t: Customers can now shop brands like Dolce&Gabbana, Balmain, Fear of God, and Chantecaille with Saks on Amazon
s: Saks on Amazon is a curated shopping ... enabling brands to expand their reach to Amazon’s diverse, fashion- and beauty-engaged customer base. Customers will enjoy the same convenience and fast and free shipping they’ve come to know and love from Amazon. Customers can also browse the launch assortment through digital window displays available in the Saks on Amazon experience. Inspired by the iconic windows at the Saks Fifth Avenue New York flagship, ...

t: High-end department store retailer Saks launches Amazon storefront | Reuters

t: Saks Fifth Avenue Just Arrived on Amazon
s: April 29, 2025 - A new collaboration has made it easy to find and get your hands on some of your favorite luxury brands. Saks Fifth Avenue has teamed up with Amazon for a curated selection of luxe pieces now available on Amazon.

t: Can Amazon finally crack luxury with Saks? | Vogue Business
s: April 30, 2025 - A variety of fashion, makeup and skincare brands are listed in the storefront, which is part of Amazon Luxury Stores, including Stella McCartney, Balmain, Dolce & Gabbana, Fear of God, Adam Lippes, Giambattista Valli and Rebecca Vallance, most with a limited selection available to shop. The user experience has familiar Amazon markers. A $1,890 Balmain cardigan comes with free one-day shipping for Prime members — along with a note that it’s sold and shipped by Saks Fifth Avenue...

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
